title: Heretic-Breaking Point
description:
Heretic (US) - Breaking Point

Full-length, Metal Blade Records
August 1988	
[add review] 
[Average rating for 1 review is 83%]	
Line-up :

Mike Howe - vocals
Bobby Marquez - guitars
Brian Korban - guitars
Dennis O&#039;Hara - bass
Rick Merrick - drums

Produced by Mill Metoyer & Kurdt Vanderhoof.

After the album had been released, Mike Howe joined Metal Church, and Heretic
fell apart. Some of the members later appeared in David Wayne&#039;s (ex-Metal Church
vocalist) project Reverend.
